p: The body weight loss observed in the experimental rats, following R. abyssinicus and C. murale extracts administered at 2000 mg/kg during acute toxicity study was similar to the reports on other plant extracts [ 19, 55, 53]. The weight loss in the rats may be due to anorexia and disturbances in carbohydrates, proteins or fat metabolism, which may have been affected by administering extracts as suggested by Ghelani et al. [ 56].
